recipesJson.name: Euler (Chocolate Coconut Pie)
recipesJson.author: MopHead
recipesJson.description: A sweet coconut and cream pie with just the right amount of chocolate. I wanted to keep the chocolate in the background in this recipe, while pushing the coconut to be the upfront main notes of the recipe. FA Breakfast cereal brings a nice and light bakery crust that compliments both the coconut and chocolate.
